articles.content:
The NBA released its 2021–22 awards finalists on Sunday afternoon, sparking fan and player reaction from across the sport regarding potential snubs for each category.

articles.author: Charles Curtis
articles.title: Virginia triple play happens after infielder forgot number of outs - For The Win
articles.description: That worked out!
articles.content:
We’ve seen it many, many times in baseball: A player forgets how many outs there are and tosses the ball to fans, or gently throws it back into the infield.
Sometimes, it’s a costly error.
